CHILDHOOD:
Lina has been growing up across cultures, languages and religions. 
Born in Baku, she did not stay long in Azerbaijan. %[Why not?](postback:why not?)
WHY NOT?:
![baku](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LinaPina/linabot/master/img/baku.jpg)
Her parents moved to Russia to start a PhD and lived in Moscow since. 
As an immigrant child Lina was not eligible for a free school education. 
However, she studied hard and got into one of the most prominent German international schools in Moscow.
Btw if you ever want to chat about something else, just say 'more'.%[Why German?!](postback:why german?!)
WHY GERMAN?!:
Dad loves Wagner. He was also working closely with Germany at some point. 
Not sure what had a more significant impact.
